description: Lists the delegates associated with a resource. Users and groups can be resource delegates and answer requests on behalf of the resource.

parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The identifier for the organization that contains the resource for which delegates are listed.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The identifier for the resource whose delegates are listed. The identifier can accept ResourceId, Resourcename, or email. The following identity formats are available: Resource ID: r-0123456789a0123456789b0123456789 Email address: resource@domain.tld Resource name: resource.

nested_items.name: Delegates
nested_items.description: One page of the resource's delegates.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The identifier for the user or group associated as the resource's delegate.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of the delegate: user or group.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token used to paginate through the delegates associated with a resource. While results are still available, it has an associated value. When the last page is reached, the token is empty.
